articles.description: The latest Birmingham City news and views from BirminghamLive
articles.content:
Nico Gordon is working his way back to fitness but John Eustace says he is not yet ready to train full time with Birmingham Citys first team. 
After breaking through last season, Gordon has not play… [+1675 chars]

articles.title: Club Statement: Cricket Disciplinary Committee Hearing - Lancashire Cricket Club
articles.description: Lancashire Cricket acknowledges and respects the decision of the Cricket Disciplinary Committee (CDC) to impose an immediate six-point deduction on the Club in the LV= Insurance County Championship.
